page.title: 14Law & Order-Denny & Dunipace
page.content: Keeping law and order is very important in Denny and Dunipace. To help we have a{Police Station}manned by an Inspector, 5 sergeants and 22 constables. The station has a lock-up cell, a detention cell and an interview room. These cells are only used to give offenders time to cool off. Real law breakers are dealt with at the{Sheriff Court in Falkirk.}In the past, police officers have gone round their district in patrol cars but, starting in July l985, a system will come into operation in certain areas. In an effort to enlist the help of the public to try to combat crime a {Community Constable}will be assigned to police a specific area. His duties will be to become more involved in the community where he works. Flexible hours will enable him to come into greater contact with the public.
